1319000.name: ESCISM (ESC Original Soundtrack)
1319000.description:
First an echo
Then a voice
How do these things go again

Here I am
Who I am
I can be without being

I am an adventurer
I am not an adventurer
I am nothing
I am gone

The echo came from
This is not how things go

There is nothing left

You were there, too
Fucked up
But existent ▼

---

ESCISM is the original soundtrack to the interactive novel ESC by Lena Raine.

This album is intended primarily for accompanying the reading experience it scores, but has been arranged to approximate the narrative arc of the game.
